reviews.name: Rocio Vizcarra
reviews.comment: I stayed for one night in August, excellent services and super comfortable rooms. Very friendly staff and excellent cleanliness. Breakfast very complete and varied, super rich everything! The location is very good because it is close to the downtown area and there are very close places to dine
